title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 220.18 - Record retention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 220.18 - Record retention

State Regulations
(a) Each
business located in a tax-free NY area and receiving tax benefits through the
program shall keep all relevant records for the duration of program
participation plus three years. (b) The department shall have the right to inspect all relevant records upon
reasonable notice to the sponsor or business. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
220.18

Amended

New

York State Register November 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 47, eff. 11/20/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
